comments.content:
this is still happening:
http://logs.openstack.org/10/107510/9/check/check-tempest-dsvm-full/a279911/logs/screen-n-api.txt.gz

logstash query shows 5+ hits in 48 hours:
"AttributeError: 'PostgreSQLOpportunisticFixture' object has no attribute '_details'"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content:
Mark, you triaged this... can you put a description of the solution into the bug report, please?

Thanks!

-jay
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content: Buggy fixture - its not upcalling first. Because of that when the fixture fails its not able to be introspected for the failure details.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless

comments.content:
https://review.openstack.org/120919 has a draft patch - I have a super full day today so I just wanted to get it up there, it needs likely polish such as testing and checking it works etc :/.

Note that this traceback is a symptom masking the real cause. I'm filing a separate bug on testtools now that we don't see the original exception at all - thats a different and related bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless

comments.content: Applying https://github.com/testing-cabal/testtools/pull/105 locally would also allow seeing the actual original exception.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless

comments.content: Is this really a critical? It looks like this happens only occasionally. I'm just not sure that the fix to oslo.db test case will make it to 1.0.0, so I propose we decrease the importance of this to Medium or High and fix in Kilo when we've got oslo.db 1.0.1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rpodolyaka

comments.content: testtools 1.1.0 should show the real issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless

comments.content: not seeing this as much in the gate, 11 hits in 10 days, dropping priority
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: nova uses oslo.db now, so the fix should be in oslo.db only
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: Proposed fix was merged and included to oslo.db 1.0.1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vsergeyev
